Package goal.tools.mc.program.goal.prolog.trans

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PrologAtom
    Represents an atom when the Prolog KRT is used.
    PrologDerives
    Implements the methods for determining whether a mental state condition can become (un)derivable after certain updates to the mental state when the Prolog KRT is used.
    PrologEquals
    Provides methods for determining whether two atoms are equal in a possibly over-approximative fashion.
    PrologGoalRepository
    Represents a repository of goals when the Prolog KRT is used.
    PrologRepositoryGoal
    Represents a repository goal when the Prolog KRT is used.
    PrologTauAnalyzer
    Represents a transition analysis tool set when the Prolog KRT is used.
    PrologTauClass
    Represents a transition class when the Prolog KRT is used.
    PrologTauModule
    Represents a transition module when the Prolog KRT is used.
    PrologTauStep
    Represents a step when the Prolog KRT is used.
    PrologTauUpdate
    Represents updates that are brought about by execution of a step, transition, or transition class when the Prolog KRT is used.
    PrologUnify
    Provides a unification method for unifying two Prolog terms.
